title: FontLab Grids
content: Is there a way to reset the grid size in Fontlab?
author: russellm

comments.content:
Preferences \> Glyph window \> Dimensions

That will bring you to a dialogue box were you can enter the "Grid step." I'm assuming that this is what you're after. There's also the more fundamental grid that everything aligns to that's determined by the font's UPM size.

Oh good grief -

I must be blind. I was through the preferences a dozen times looking for that.

Thank you
